name: LEARN TO FLY AUSTRALIA PTY LTD
about: Learn To Fly Australia is a premier flight training institution based at Melbourne's Moorabbin Airport. As a Part 142 Flight School and Registered Training Organisation (RTO) approved by the Australian Skills Quality Authority (ASQA), we offer nationally recognised training in the Vocational Education and Training (VET) sector. Our fleet includes Diamond DA40 and DA42 aircraft, and our advanced training facility features a Flight Operations building, Theory Center, Simulator Center, and maintenance hangar. With a team of experienced instructors and a commitment to affordability and accessibility, we provide flexible course options and career pathways in partnership with major airlines. Our mission is to make flight training simple and achievable for all, ensuring you receive the best training from the best instructors to bring out your best as a pilot.
services:
["Pilot Licence Programs
Diploma of Aviation
Ratings & Endorsements
Advanced Training Endorsements
Airline Interview Preparation
Theory"]
